text: I have a question :smile: - what's the best library to use if you're writing a JSON-API compliant service in node.js. Seems to be a lot of options <http://jsonapi.org/implementations/#server-libraries-node-js>
I'm *only* looking for the serialisation layer
I wrote my first lines of typescript this weekend and it's actually very very nice
it almost feels like an untyped language
hello peeps. Can someone tell me how I access a service in an acceptance test?
last time I had to resort to `let myService = this.application.__deprecatedInstance__.lookup(‘service:my-service’);`. I’m hoping there’s something better than that?
at least not a much better one
